info.title: Senior Project
info.summary: This is an API for a small hometown movie theater
info.description: This is created for a senior project for an applied technology degree from BYU-Idaho. It is built by Katrina Lyman with the needs of San Juan Theater in mind, and under the supervision of Professor Blaine Robertson and Nathan Birch.

get.description: This will return the authenticated user profile information for the current authenticated user.

post.description: Enter the required information to add a new user to the users collection

get.description: Get an array of all users in the collection
Get an array of all users in the collection

get.summary: Get current users status and name
get.description: This will return the current users status and name if authenticated
This will return a single user by Email

put.description: This will update a single user by ID

delete.description: This will delete a single user by ID. This action cannot be reversed.

post.description: Enter the required information to add a new movie to the movies collection

example.title: The Fall Guy
example.overview: He's a stuntman, and like everyone in the stunt community, he gets blown up, shot, crashed, thrown through windows and dropped from the highest of heights, all for our entertainment. And now, fresh off an almost career-ending accident, this working-class hero has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life while still doing his day job. What could possibly go right?

What could possibly go right?

delete.description: This will delete a single movie by ID. This action cannot be reversed.

post.description: Enter the required information to add a new showtimes to the showtimes collection

get.description: Get an array of all showtimes in the collection
Get a single showtime by showtime ID
This will return the movies now playing based on the current date and available showtimes

example.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
example.overview: Director Wes Ball breathes new life into the global, epic franchise set several generations in the future following Caesar's reign, in which apes are the dominant species living harmoniously and humans have been reduced to living in the shadows. As a new tyrannical ape leader builds his empire, one young ape undertakes a harrowing journey that will cause him to question all that he has known about the past and to make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

get.description: This will return the movies coming soon based on the current date and available showtimes

example.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
example.overview: Director Wes Ball breathes new life into the global, epic franchise set several generations in the future following Caesar's reign, in which apes are the dominant species living harmoniously and humans have been reduced to living in the shadows. As a new tyrannical ape leader builds his empire, one young ape undertakes a harrowing journey that will cause him to question all that he has known about the past and to make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

get.description: This will return showtimes for a single movie by movie ID

put.description: This will update showtimes by ID

delete.description: This will delete a showtimes by ID. This action cannot be reversed.

get.description: Generates tickets for movies by showtime ID.
Get an array of all tickets in the ticket collection

get.summary: Get tickets by showtime and date
get.description: Get an array of tickets by showtime and date in the ticket collection

get.summary: Get available tickets by showtime and date
get.description: Get an array of available tickets by showtime and date in the ticket collection

post.description: This will record a single ticket purchase
This will record purchase of up to 20 tickets

delete.description: This will delete a single ticket by ID. This action cannot be reversed.

get.description: Gets the shopping cart for a single user currently authenticated
Gets the shopping cart for a single user by user ID

post.description: This will add items to a users shopping cart

put.summary: Update price type of a ticket in the cart
put.description: This will update the price type of a specific ticket in the current users shopping cart

post.description: This will remove expired items from shopping carts

delete.summary: Empty a shopping cart by ID
delete.description: This will remove all items from a shopping cart.

post.description: Enter the required information to add a new event to the events collection

example.title: Summer Movie Club
example.tagline: Passes Available Now! 10 Weeks of Summer Fun Mattinee Movies for Kids.
example.description: The summer movie club pass allows kids to enjoy exciting movies at the theater for an amazing price. Plus save even more on with the kids summer snack packs. Passes are sold for Tuesdays or Thursdays. Attend up to 10 movies throughout the summer!

example.title: Big News Title
example.tagline: Catchy Headline For Big News Title
example.description: A few short paragraphs explaining the big news that is happening. Details about the big news are included here. This announcement will explain what you need to know about the big news.
